data.text: Mad ibar polo mondo ilor piny,
mana kaka mach wangʼo yugi kendo yienyo pi,
nyaka aa nene onge ngʼama osewinjo,
Ikonyo joma nigi mor mar timo gik makare,
Kata kamano, yaye Jehova Nyasaye, in e Wuonwa.
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, kik ibed gi mirima mokadho apima,
Hekalu marwa maler, kendo man-gi duongʼ mane kwerewa opakie,
Bangʼ magi duto, yaye Jehova Nyasaye,
